name: Cat Sumo!
description:
Hi!

This game was made as a college project. We made it with just a few days, it was a bit challenging, but we hope you'll enjoy it!

Objective

A fight to the death (almost) between two cats for the last and only late afternoon sunlight.

Story

....we dont have one, what you see its what you get... or is it?!

Mechanics

Push each other to get one player out of the arena (the sunlight).

Controls

WASD to move Cappuccino and use SPACE to atack.

←↑→↓ to move Blueberry and use 0 (numpad) to atack.

Members

Gabriel Muller and Marcos Andrade as the Programmers;

Luana Bandeira as the Character Artist and Animator;

Samuel Alves as the Background Artist;

Gustavo Cavalcante as the Music and SFX Artist;

Silvano Araújo as the Producer and Game Designer.

And a Special Thanks for Nathan Scott, creator of Fibberish, the font we used.

Thanks for playing!
